tldr: Inconsistent interpretation of http requests ('http request/response smuggling') in ASP.NET Core allows an authorized attacker to bypass a security feature over a network.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: Inconsistent Interpretation of HTTP Requests ('HTTP Request/Response Smuggling')
